languages.text: "Значит, вам придется делать это без желания, почтенн{mf|ый|ая} {name}. Похоже, вы так и не уловили важный нюанс — я не интересуюсь вашим мнением, а ставлю вас перед фактом. Когда на кону безопасность целого сектора, игра перестает быть игрой и становится войной. Считайте, что династия фон Валанциус... мобилизована мной по повелению {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотого Трона{/g}".

"That means we will be proceeding without your approval, esteemed {name}. It would seem you still haven't picked up on an important detail — I am not asking your opinion, I am apprising you of where you stand. When the safety of an entire sector is at stake, the game stops being a game and turns into a war. You may see this as me conscripting House von Valancius at the behest of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}."
languages.original_text: "Значит, вам придется делать это без желания, почтенн{mf|ый|ая} {name}. Похоже, вы так и не уловили важный нюанс — я не интересуюсь вашим мнением, а ставлю вас перед фактом. Когда на кону безопасность целого сектора, игра перестает быть игрой и становится войной. Считайте, что династия фон Валанциус... мобилизована мной по повелению {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотого Трона{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "Then you will have to have them without wanting to, esteemed {name}. It would seem you still haven't picked up on an important caveat — I am not asking your opinion, I am apprising you of where you stand. When the safety of an entire sector is at stake, the game stops being a game and turns into a war. You may see this as me... conscripting House von Valancius by the command of the Golden Throne."

"Then you will have to have them without wanting to, esteemed {name}. It would seem you still haven't picked up on an important caveat — I am not asking your opinion, I am apprising you of where you stand. When the safety of an entire sector is at stake, the game stops being a game and turns into a war. You may see this as me... conscripting House von Valancius by the command of the Golden Throne."

"That means we will be proceeding without your approval, esteemed {name}. It would seem you still haven't picked up on an important detail — I am not asking your opinion, I am apprising you of where you stand. When the safety of an entire sector is at stake, the game stops being a game and turns into a war. You may see this as me... conscripting House von Valancius at the behest of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}."

"That means we will be proceeding without your approval, esteemed {name}. It would seem you still haven't picked up on an important detail — I am not asking your opinion, I am apprising you of where you stand. When the safety of an entire sector is at stake, the game stops being a game and turns into a war. You may see this as me... conscripting House von Valancius at the behest of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}."

"That means we will be proceeding without your approval, esteemed {name}. It would seem you still haven't picked up on an important detail — I am not asking your opinion, I am apprising you of where you stand. When the safety of an entire sector is at stake, the game stops being a game and turns into a war. You may see this as me... conscripting House von Valancius at the behest of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}."

languages.text: 「つまり、我々はお前の承認なしに事を進めてよいのだな、尊敬受けし{name}殿。まだ重要なことをきちんと理解できていないようだな。私はお前の意見など求めていない。お前の立場を教えてやっているのだ。星域全体の安全が脅かされれば、ゲームはゲームでなくなり、戦争へと変わる。これを、私が{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金の玉座{/g}の意向に従い、フォン・ヴァランシウス家を徴用していると見るかもしれないな」
languages.original_text: "That means we will be proceeding without your approval, esteemed {name}. It would seem you still haven't picked up on an important detail — I am not asking your opinion, I am apprising you of where you stand. When the safety of an entire sector is at stake, the game stops being a game and turns into a war. You may see this as me conscripting House von Valancius at the behest of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}."

traits.locale_text: 「つまり、我々はお前の承認なしに事を進めてよいのだな、尊敬受けし{name}殿。まだ重要なことをきちんと理解できていないようだな。私はお前の意見など求めていない。お前の立場を教えてやっているのだ。星域全体の安全が脅かされれば、ゲームはゲームでなくなり、戦争へと変わる。これを、私が{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金の玉座{/g}の意向に従い、フォン・ヴァランシウス家を徴用していると見るかもしれないな」

languages.original_text: "That means we will be proceeding without your approval, esteemed . It would seem you still haven't picked up on an important detail — I am not asking your opinion, I am apprising you of where you stand. When the safety of an entire sector is at stake, the game stops being a game and turns into a war. You may see this as me... conscripting House von Valancius at the behest of the Golden Throne."

languages.text: “既然如此，那恐怕我只能在你不同意的情况下擅自行动了，尊敬的{name}。看来，你还没有正确理解这场谈话的重点——我不是在征询你的意见，而是在帮助你认清自己的立场。当整片星区都陷入危机时，这场游戏就不再是游戏，而是战争。你可以将我这番话看作是以{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}的名义，对冯·瓦兰修斯家族的征召。”
languages.original_text: "That means we will be proceeding without your approval, esteemed {name}. It would seem you still haven't picked up on an important detail — I am not asking your opinion, I am apprising you of where you stand. When the safety of an entire sector is at stake, the game stops being a game and turns into a war. You may see this as me conscripting House von Valancius at the behest of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}."

traits.locale_text: “既然如此，那恐怕我只能在你不同意的情况下擅自行动了，尊敬的{name}。看来，你还没有正确理解这场谈话的重点——我不是在征询你的意见，而是在帮助你认清自己的立场。当整片星区都陷入危机时，这场游戏就不再是游戏，而是战争。你可以将我这番话看作是以{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}的名义，对冯·瓦兰修斯家族的征召。”

languages.text: «Pues tendremos que continuar sin su aprobación, estimad{mf|o|a} {name}. Parece que todavía no comprende un detalle importante: no le estoy pidiendo su opinión, le estoy informando de su posición. Cuando la seguridad de todo un sector está en juego, el juego deja de ser juego y se convierte en guerra. Si quiere, vea esto como un reclutamiento forzoso de la casa von Valancius al servicio del {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono Dorado{/g}».
languages.original_text: "That means we will be proceeding without your approval, esteemed {name}. It would seem you still haven't picked up on an important detail — I am not asking your opinion, I am apprising you of where you stand. When the safety of an entire sector is at stake, the game stops being a game and turns into a war. You may see this as me conscripting House von Valancius at the behest of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}."

traits.locale_text: «Pues tendremos que continuar sin su aprobación, estimad{mf|o|a} {name}. Parece que todavía no comprende un detalle importante: no le estoy pidiendo su opinión, le estoy informando de su posición. Cuando la seguridad de todo un sector está en juego, el juego deja de ser juego y se convierte en guerra. Si quiere, vea esto como un reclutamiento forzoso de la casa von Valancius al servicio del {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono Dorado{/g}».

languages.text: « Ce qui signifie que nous allons devoir poursuivre sans votre aval, honorable {name}. Il semblerait qu'un détail important vous échappe : je ne suis pas là pour vous demander votre avis, mais tout simplement pour vous dire où est votre place. Quand il en va de la survie de tout un secteur, le jeu cesse d'être un jeu. Le jeu devient une guerre. En résumé, c'est comme si j'appelais la maison von Valancius sous les drapeaux au nom du {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône d'Or{/g}. »
languages.original_text: "That means we will be proceeding without your approval, esteemed {name}. It would seem you still haven't picked up on an important detail — I am not asking your opinion, I am apprising you of where you stand. When the safety of an entire sector is at stake, the game stops being a game and turns into a war. You may see this as me conscripting House von Valancius at the behest of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}."

traits.locale_text: « Ce qui signifie que nous allons devoir poursuivre sans votre aval, honorable {name}. Il semblerait qu'un détail important vous échappe : je ne suis pas là pour vous demander votre avis, mais tout simplement pour vous dire où est votre place. Quand il en va de la survie de tout un secteur, le jeu cesse d'être un jeu. Le jeu devient une guerre. En résumé, c'est comme si j'appelais la maison von Valancius sous les drapeaux au nom du {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône d'Or{/g}. »

languages.text: "Dann werden wir ohne Eure Zustimmung fortfahren, {mf|geschätzter|geschätzte} {name}. Ihr habt offenbar ein wichtiges Detail immer noch nicht begriffen – ich frage nicht nach Eurer Meinung, ich informiere Euch, wo Ihr steht. Wenn die Sicherheit eines ganzen Sektors auf dem Spiel steht, ist es kein Spiel mehr, sondern wird zu einem Krieg. Seht es einfach so: Ich ... führe hiermit eine Zwangsverpflichtung des Hauses von Valancius im Namen des {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Goldenen Throns{/g} durch."
languages.original_text: "That means we will be proceeding without your approval, esteemed {name}. It would seem you still haven't picked up on an important detail — I am not asking your opinion, I am apprising you of where you stand. When the safety of an entire sector is at stake, the game stops being a game and turns into a war. You may see this as me conscripting House von Valancius at the behest of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Dann werden wir ohne Eure Zustimmung fortfahren, {mf|geschätzter|geschätzte} {name}. Ihr habt offenbar ein wichtiges Detail immer noch nicht begriffen – ich frage nicht nach Eurer Meinung, ich informiere Euch, wo Ihr steht. Wenn die Sicherheit eines ganzen Sektors auf dem Spiel steht, ist es kein Spiel mehr, sondern wird zu einem Krieg. Seht es einfach so: Ich ... führe hiermit eine Zwangsverpflichtung des Hauses von Valancius im Namen des {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Goldenen Throns{/g} durch."

languages.text: "Bu demek oluyor ki onayın olmadan ilerleyeceğiz saygıdeğer {name}. Bana öyle geliyor ki önemli bir detayı hâlâ kavrayamadın: Sana fikrini sormuyorum, yalnızca seni bilgilendiriyorum. Bütün bir sektörün güvenliği söz konusu olduğunda oyun, oyun olmaktan çıkar ve savaşa dönüşür. Bunu, von Valancius Hanesi'nin {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Altın Taht{/g} adına bizimle aynı cephede yer almasına dair şahsi çabam olarak görebilirsin."
languages.original_text: "That means we will be proceeding without your approval, esteemed {name}. It would seem you still haven't picked up on an important detail — I am not asking your opinion, I am apprising you of where you stand. When the safety of an entire sector is at stake, the game stops being a game and turns into a war. You may see this as me conscripting House von Valancius at the behest of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Bu da demek oluyor ki senin onayın olmadan ilerleyeceğiz saygıdeğer {name}. Bana öyle geliyor ki önemli bir detayı hâlâ kavrayamadın: Sana fikrini sormuyorum, yalnızca seni bilgilendiriyorum. Bütün bir sektörün güvenliği söz konusu olduğunda oyun bir oyun olmaktan çıkar ve bir savaşa dönüşür. Bunu, von Valancius Hanesi'nin {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Altın Taht{/g} adına bizimle aynı cephede yer almasına dair şahsi çabam olarak görebilirsin."
